Purvanchal bank provides Tractor Loan to buyers/tractor owner having agricultural land in a convenient manner with less paper work

Advantages:

-> Loan procedure is eassy 
-> Processing is Very Eassy 
-> 9 years of repayments 
-> Repayment options is flexible 
-> Rate of Interest is fixed throughout the tenure 
-> Non- mortgage loan available 
-> Processing fee is low 
-> Interest Rate is low

Eligibility:

-> Borrower must have minimum of 3 acres of land of his own 
->For eligibility calculation Agriculture income is being considered 
-> For commercial segments Commercial Income is being considered

How to apply:

Please visit the nearest branch of Purvanchal bank
